definition: based on an incorrect or misleading notion or information
details:
adjective
- based on an incorrect or misleading notion or information
= example: based on an incorrect or misleading notion or information
- intended to deceive
= synonyms: inauthentic, unauthentic, spurious, fraudulent, deceitful
- containing or based on a fallacy
= example: containing or based on a fallacy
= synonyms: unsound
